entry.title: Death Star THCa Flower
entry.summary:
Vendor: Perfect Plant™
Type: THCa Flower
Price: 55.00 - 330.00 (4 variants)

Meet Death Star THCa Flower, an indica strain born from the genetic fusion of Sensi Star and Sour Diesel. Its name pays tribute to the strain's unique blend of skunky sweet jet fuel aromas, creating an aromatic experience that captivates the senses.

While it won't obliterate planets like its spacefaring namesake, Death Star delivers a robust buzz, inducing a potent mix of sleepiness, relaxation, and euphoria. Bred by anonymous cultivators, this strain boasts flavors of diesel, pungency, and tea, with an undisclosed dominant terpene. Beyond its botanical appeal, Death Star offers a unique connection to the Star Wars universe, allowing enthusiasts to explore the power of the dark side or rebel against the Empire through the tranquil embrace of its effects.

Whether you're dealing with stress, pain, or anxiety, Death Star THCa Flower remains a resilient choice, surviving in the cannabis galaxy despite the cosmic explosions of its fictional counterpart.


Specifications

  • Hybrid
  • 29.3% THCA
  • 0.16% ∆9 THC

See testing results

THCA Disclaimer: This product is not available for shipment to the following states: Hawaii, Idaho, Minnesota, Oregon, Rhode Island, Utah, Vermont.

With predominantly sweet flavors, including fruity citrus and vanilla notes, Gelonade captivates the palate. Indulge in Gelonade for a delightful experience that goes beyond its enticing flavor profile.

entry.title: Guava Cake THCa Flower
entry.summary:
Vendor: Perfect Plant™
Type: THCa Flower
Price: 40.00 - 240.00 (4 variants)

Guava Cake THCa flower, a hybrid strain thought to emerge from a unique cross involving Wedding Cake. Known for its calming rather than energizing effects, Guava Cake induces a tingling, aroused, and giggly sensation.

Users advise having a glass of water on hand, as this strain may lead to dry mouth. With a tropical flavor profile featuring sweet notes of pear and tree fruit, this strain offers a delightful sensory experience. Boasting a THCa content of 23%, Guava Cake is a preferred choice for seasoned THCa consumers.

Despite its popularity, the original breeder of this strain remains a mystery, adding an air of intrigue. Believed to be rich in caryophyllene, Guava Cake stands as a captivating addition to the world of hybrid strains.

Specifications

  • Hybrid
  • 23.5% THCA

See testing results

THCA Disclaimer: This product is not available for shipment to the following states: Hawaii, Idaho, Minnesota, Oregon, Rhode Island, Utah, Vermont.

entry.title: Biscotti Pancakes THCa Flower
entry.summary:
Vendor: Perfect Plant™
Type: THCa Flower
Price: 40.00 - 240.00 (4 variants)

Biscotti Pancakes THCa flower, an indica-dominant hybrid born from the crossbreeding of two delectably sweet strains by the legendary breeder Cookies: Biscotti and Pancakes. This strain delights the senses with a sweet syrup or frosting aroma, complemented by a rich fuel undertone.

The experience begins with a euphoric lift in mood, accompanied by a subtle infusion of mental energy, effectively alleviating mental stress and frustrations. As a serene and happier mental state unfolds, a soothing buzz envelops the entire body, inducing a content and laid-back demeanor.

Optimal for afternoons when a calm mind and body are desired, small doses of Biscotti Pancakes prove ideal; however, caution is advised with larger doses, as they can be more sedating and are best reserved for the evening relaxation.


Specifications

  • Hybrid
  • 22.1% THCA
  • 0.08% ∆9 THC

Creamsicle THCa flower, a hybrid cannabis strain, is the result of crossing Orange Crush with Juicy Fruit strains. Boasting a vibrant citrus flavor and aroma reminiscent of a creamsicle with a subtle hint of vanilla, this strain offers a sensory delight.

With an impressive 27% THCa, Creamsicle caters to the preferences of experienced cannabis consumers, delivering uplifting, happy, and energetic effects, as attested by Perfect Plant customers.

Creamsicle showcases a flavor profile encompassing orange, vanilla, and citrus, with myrcene as the dominant terpene.

entry.title: Purple Runtz THCa Flower
entry.summary:
Vendor: Perfect Plant™
Type: THCa Flower
Price: 40.00 - 240.00 (4 variants)

Meet Purple Runtz THCa flower, also recognized as “Purple Runts,” a hybrid cannabis strain resulting from the crossbreeding of Gelato #33 and Zkittlez. Distinguished by its calming rather than energizing effects, this strain has garnered acclaim from customers who describe sensations of arousal, euphoria, and a delightful tingle.

With a THCa content of 28%, Purple Runtz caters to both novice and seasoned cannabis enthusiasts alike. Limonene takes the lead as the dominant terpene, contributing to the strain's citrusy essence.

Users report an earthy flavor profile complemented by grape and tropical undertones. Ideal for addressing mild pain, stress, or inflammation, Purple Runtz is a popular choice among medical marijuana patients seeking relief. The identity of the original breeder remains unknown, adding an air of mystery to this captivating strain.


Specifications

  • Hybrid
  • 28.3% THCA
  • 0.09% ∆9 THC

See testing results

entry.title: White Fire THCa Flower
entry.summary:
Vendor: Perfect Plant™
Type: THCa Flower
Price: 50.00 - 300.00 (4 variants)

Introducing White Fire THCa Flower by Perfect Plant, a premium hybrid derived from the genetic fusion of Fire OG and The White, also known as “WiFi OG,” “WiFi,” “White Fire,” and “WiFi Kush.” This high-potency strain boasts a formidable 28% THCa, making it an optimal selection for seasoned cannabis consumers seeking uplifting and cerebral effects.

Bred by undisclosed cultivators, White Fire OG emanates a sour and earthy aroma, accompanied by subtle notes of citrus and diesel. With flavors described as pungent, earthy, and spicy/herbal, and myrcene as the dominant terpene, this strain offers a complex sensory profile.

White Fire OG is a potent and well-balanced option, perfect for those seeking a mind and mood-enhancing cannabis experience.

  • 28.2% THCA
  • 0.03% ∆9 THC

entry.summary:
Vendor: Perfect Plant™
Type: THCa Flower
Price: 50.00 - 300.00 (4 variants)

Renowned for its delightful aroma reminiscent of fresh strawberries and an expansive sensation that may induce even the most seasoned consumer to cough, Strawberry Cough THCa flower stands as a potent sativa strain with enigmatic genetic lineage.

While its origins remain somewhat mysterious, it is believed that Strawberry Cough is a cross between Haze and Strawberry Fields. The enticing combination of skunky and berry flavors captivates the senses, while the cerebral and uplifting effects create an euphoric aura guaranteed to leave a cheerful grin on your face.

Ideal for moments of heightened stress, Strawberry Cough presents itself as a soothing solution to ease tension and elevate mood.

entry.title: Jealousy THCa Flower
entry.summary:
Vendor: Perfect Plant™
Type: THCa Flower
Price: 50.00 - 300.00 (4 variants)

Jealousy THCa Flower by Perfect Plant, a meticulously crafted hybrid born from the fusion of Sherbert Bx1 and Gelato 41. This strain is celebrated for its impeccable balance, offering users a harmonious blend of mental relaxation and physical energy, as attested by Leafly reviewers.

Boasting a potent THCa percentage in the high 20s, Jealousy caters to the discerning tastes of experienced cannabis enthusiasts. Caryophyllene takes center stage among the terpenes, delivering a distinctive fuel aroma, complemented by limonene, myrcene, and occasional notes of linalool and humulene.

The strain's earthy and funky flavor profile enhances the overall experience, garnering praise from users. Jealousy THCa Flower stands as a testament to the artistry of cannabis cultivation, promising a unique and memorable journey in every premium-quality bud.

Goji Berry THCa flower, a potent sativa-dominant hybrid (70% sativa/30% indica) derived from the Goji OG strain, is celebrated for its energizing effects and delightful flavor. It provides an immediate burst of invigorating energy, promoting creativity and happiness, making it perfect for daytime activities and socializing.

Its buds boast fruity notes of blueberry, cherry, and citrus, while the aroma carries a zesty citrus overtone with hints of berries and earthiness. The nugs are small and heart-shaped, featuring blue-green tones, yellow-orange hairs, and a generous coating of white trichomes.
